thread.section_title: Logoscientist Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Logoscientist | logoscientist.net
thread.title: Briana

author: Briana
title: Briana
text: I can not begin to thank the team that worked with me on my logo. I'm a senior in college and I wanted a logo for personal branding and I found this company via Google. After a long chat with Zach I felt as though my ideas were in safe hands.Plus, the way he spoke to me made me feel as though my ideas were just a important to him as they are to me. They worked with me and always kept me in the loop throughout the design process. Take it from me, ignore the negative comments that you find when researching company. They're great! and I hope to work with them again.
